name: Cryptic Clash
description:
Cryptic Clash is an educational auto-battler where password strength is taken very literally. Ever wondered how strong a password is? Well now you can watch them battle it out!

Controls: Click to move your password

Made in 2 weeks for Cybersecurity Game Jam 2021
Theme: Good Password and Bad Password - Players will learn about how to compose a good password and avoid composing bad passwords.

Fonts by https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free and https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram
Graphics by https://anokolisa.itch.io/high-forest-assets-pack
SFX by https://kenney.nl/

Want to learn more about what makes a good password? Check out my sources here!

https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/32040?hl=en#zippy=
https://sea.pcmag.com/password-managers/43914/password-managers-youre-doing-it-w...
https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/baw/19.x?topic=security-characters-that-are-valid-us...
https://www.security.org/how-secure-is-my-password/
https://xkcd.com/936/
